mapper.select: select p.id, p.permission_name, p.parent_id, p.item_type, p.permission_code, p.permission_url from permission p LEFT JOIN role_permission rp ON rp.permission_id=p.id LEFT JOIN role r ON r.id=rp.role_id and r.delete_state = '0' LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON ur.role_id=r.id WHERE ur.user_id=#{USER_ID} and p.item_type = #{ITEM_TYPE} and p.delete_state = '0' order by p.sort

mapper.insert: insert into permission( permission_name, parent_id, item_type, description, permission_code, permission_url, sort, create_op, create_date ) values( #{permissionName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissionUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createOp, jdbcType=INTEGER}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
